mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.email_url, t.email_owner, t.owner_desc, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_email t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.email_url like concat('%',#{email_url},'%')
and t.email_owner like concat('%',#{email_owner},'%')
and t.owner_desc like concat('%',#{owner_desc},'%')
and t.rec_person=#{rec_person}
